attributes.action: create a Minister for Manufacturing and have a Minister who is an expert not a PR man.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Manufacturing is an important part of wealth creation. According to PriceWaterHouseCoopers, the UK manufacturing sector is the 6th largest in the world. However, the UK needs the  needs a minister who has portfolio specifically to do do manufacturing.
